Body:
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.build_kernel('Hex'), self.
    hexagonal_kernel_1)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.build_kernel('Hex', dilation=2), self.
    hexagonal_kernel_1_2)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.build_kernel('Hex', radius=2), self.
    hexagonal_kernel_2)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.build_kernel('Square'), self.
    square_kernel_1)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.build_kernel('Square', dilation=2),
    self.square_kernel_1_2)
torch.testing.assert_allclose(utils.build_kernel('Square', radius=0), self.
    square_kernel_0)
